Shortcut stack

Arrange your go-to shortcuts. The first three appear on mobile quick access.

How shortcuts work

Shortcuts power the ⚡ Quick Add modal. Each entry stores optional presets such as amount, category, account, notes, or any metadata you wish to reuse. They are saved to your browser today and ready for syncing to the quick_add_shortcut table when persistence lands.

  • Drag items to reprioritise what shows up first.
  • Toggle Active to hide shortcuts without deleting them.
  • Use valid JSON for presets — it will be passed directly into the Add modal.
